summary: AN ORDINANCE authorizing the purchase, for park, open space and recreation purposes, of real property commonly known as Webster Park, a portion of the former Webster Elementary School, located at 3017 NW 67th Street, from Seattle School District No. 1, and authorizing acceptance of the deed, making appropriations, amending the 2008-2013 Capital Improvement Program, and authorizing the loan of funds from the City's Consolidated (Residual) Cash Pool, or its participating funds, to the Cumulative Reserve Subfund-Unrestricted Subaccount, all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
